title: The Favorites - NFL Divisional Playoffs Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Divisional Playoffs Gambling Preview
description:
Fresh off a humiliating loss for Arizona Cardinals coach Kliff Kingsbury on Monday night, hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network preview the Divisional Round of the NFL playoffs. But first, they tip their cap to their producer Matt Mitchell. Mitchell enjoyed the best weekend of his life, as his beloved Buffalo Bills stomped out rival New England on Saturday night, before Arizona proved his years-long rant about Kingsbury overwhelmingly correct just 48 hours later.

Together Chad and Simon discuss the Bengals at Titans game, plus the rest of a tasty slate of this quarterfinal round of the playoffs, covering sides and totals as they look to narrow their focus on Thursday to their final betting selections.

CIN TEN - 20 MIN

SF GB - 27 MIN

LAR TB - 34 MIN

BUF KC - 38 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
